results.title: Cardiovascular and inflammatory effects of simvastatin therapy in patients with COPD: a randomized controlled trial
results.journal: Int J Chron Obstruct Pulmon Dis
results.text_hl: Overall, there was a nonsignificant reduction in the primary endpoint of @<m>DISEASE_Symphalangism_C</m>.<m>_S</m>.<m>_Lewis_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566100 @@@aortic stiffness@@@ following 6 weeks of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg once daily compared with placebo.
